Package MatrixPackage

package MatrixPackage
  • Class
    Description
    Indexes
    This is a record representing the index of a matrix.
    Matrix<T>
    This is a generic matrix interface which can be used to instantiate a matrix data type such as MatrixMap and SparseMatrixMap.
    MatrixMap<T>
    This is a class representing a standard matrix with each entry consisting of an Indexes object as keys and generic T values
    MatrixMap.InconsistentSizeException
    This is a nested Exception class to aid error handling by defining protocols for controlling Matrix sizes.
    MatrixMap.InvalidLengthException
    This is a nested Exception class to aid error handling by defining protocols for controlling Matrix lengths.
    MatrixMap.InvalidLengthException.Cause
    Defines the possible values of a Matrix, which could be subject to an invalid length.
    MatrixMap.NonSquareException
    This a nested Exception class to aid error handling, used to check if a Matrix object represents a square matrix.
    MatrixRing<T>
    This is a class defining a Ring for matrix operations, specifically addition and multiplication.
    SparseMatrixMap<T>
    This is a class representing a sparse matrix with each entry consisting of an Indexes object as keys and generic T values (barring zeros).
